title: Home settings, policies, and rules | Help Center
short_description: To help you get started with your listing, we recommend certain home settings and have a set of required settings and rules on each home.
article:
Each home is unique and you’re able to control key booking settings on Fairly. To help you get started with your listing, we recommend certain settings and have a set of required settings and rules on each home. Continue reading below to understand the default settings. The following settings are required on each Fairly home:These settings cannot be modified:- No smoking - No weapons on the property - No dangerous animals on the property - Instant book - Guests can book 18 months in advance. You can add blocks to your calendar if you want to restrict this booking window.We recommend these settings for your home:- Pricing accelerator - lower your rates by 20% for the first 60 days to earn early reservations and early reviews. - You can edit this by going to Pricing. - Pricing per night - We default to the recommended dynamic pricing strategy. - You can edit this at anytime by going to the Pricing tab and choosing a different strategy. - You can also edit individual night pricing. - Minimum nights for each booking - 2. - You can edit this by going to Listing > Access & Policies - Maximum nights for each booking - 27. - You can edit this by going to Listing > Access & Policies - We support stays up to 180 nights long. - Cancellation policies - we recommend the Firm setting for Airbnb and Moderate setting for Vrbo. - You can edit this by going to Listing > Access & Policies - Check-in time - 4pm. Check-out time - 10am. - Coming soon on being able to edit these settings. - No events. - You can edit this by going to Listing > Access & Policies. - No commercial photography. - You can edit this by going to Listing > Access & Policies.Additional rules and policiesIn addition to our recommended settings above, you can change the following to your preferences:- Minimum age to rent: The minimum age to rent defaults to 18, but can be increased to 25. This will appear in the House Rules sections on Airbnb and Vrbo. - Note: It is very tough to enforce this rule. Airbnb in most areas only restricts to age 18, even if you put this in your house rules. - Custom rules: In this section, you can set up to 3 custom rules (for example: quiet hours, access policies, etc). - If you wish to have additional home rules or policies, we recommend adding these to the end of your home description.
​
claude_summary: Overview of required and recommended booking settings for Fairly vacation rental listings, including policies on smoking, instant book, pricing, stay duration, and cancellation rules.
